data.actual_result: it says "in this channel" instead of "in this server", as if it's in the channel settings
data.expected_result: Since it's Server Settings, it would say "Members must use Push-to-talk in this channel if this permission is disallowed."
data.short_description: In Server Settings > Roles, the description for Use Voice Activity says "channel" instead of "server".
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings on a server you own/are admin on/have the manage roles permission on - Go to the Roles tab - Scroll all the way down - Read the description for "Use Voice Activity"
